name: Dvs-python
tagline: UCSD Global TIES's Digital Vision Screening Project
body:
# Our Team

We're an interdisciplinary [team](http://ties.ucsd.edu/dvs.html) of UCSD students working with the [Global TIES](http://ties.ucsd.edu/) program to create a robust, easy-to-use hardware and software system that utilizes computer vision to automatically detect eye diseases in children.

# Who We Work For

Our client is [Save Our Children's Sight](http://shileyeye.ucsd.edu/about-us/shiley-eyemobile/), a program that works closely with the [Shiley Eye Center](http://shileyeye.ucsd.edu/) to provide an unprecedented model for community health by overcoming barriers to care for the underserved. Save Our Children's Sight accomplishes it's mission of providing low-income children aged 2-6 the vision they need to succeed in life by identifying, treating, and preventing vision disorders.

# What We Do

We're combining specialized hardware and software to create a digital vision screening system that automatically detects the presence of eye diseases such as amblyopia, strabismus, and cataracts.

## Technologies
* OpenCV
* PIL
* wxPython
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
